content: RT 6-22 rivet nose piece sets Rivet nose piece set for fastening steel, aluminum and stainless-steel rivets with your RT 6-22 cordless rivet tool (set includes 2.4mm, 3.2mm, 4.0mm and 4.8mm) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for specialty power tools ### FEATURES:Features Multiple sizes – each set comes pre-packaged with a 2.4mm, 3.2mm, 4.0mm and 4.8mm nose piece to match your standard riveting applications Replacement part – helps to replace your lost or damaged rivet nose pieces Applications Retaining nose pieces help prevent rivets from falling out when working downwards Replacement nose pieces for the RT 6-22 cordless rivet tool ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2319079 - Nose piece RT 6 RN (4) set - Package Size 1 pc
